definition: to shed tears/to be all in tears
to wave/to brandish/to command/to conduct/to scatter/to disperse

sentences.english: The moment the son was about to go aboard ship , they kissed good - bye with tears.
sentences.chinese: 孩子馬上就要登上去國外的船，他們揮淚吻別。

sentences.english: As a revenge, the chance will tear itself away from your side.
sentences.chinese: 若是爲了復仇的話，機會會從你身邊揮淚離開的。
